>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/call/find"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Obtiene la lista de llamadas activas o historial de llamadas de la instancia.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"active","in":"query","schema":{"type":"boolean"},"description":"Filtrar solo llamadas activas (true) o todas (false/omitir)","required":false}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Lista de llamadas","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"ID único de la llamada"},"remoteJid":{"type":"string","description":"JID del contacto"},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["incoming","outgoing","active","ended","rejected"]},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["voice","video"]},"timestamp":{"type":"integer"},"duration":{"type":"integer","description":"Duración en segundos (si finalizada)"}},"title":"Call"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
